video.title: La Reina del Sur
video.synopsis: After years of blood, sweat and tears, a woman from humble beginnings finds herself in the perilous position of being a legend in drug trafficking.

episodes.synopsis: Teresa is a humble woman who gets caught up in the underworld for the inheritance of a risky love.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: A planner saves Teresa's life, and she makes a deal with Epifanio for El Güero's information, but death and suspicions surround her, and she is set up by someone she doesn't know.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Promising to reveal the location of the planner, Teresa persuades Willy to take her to San Diego, where she discovers El Ratas has followed her.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Teresa leaves Mexico to try her luck elsewhere, and arrives in Spain in the midst of a sexual game intended to get El Güero out of her heart.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: A fraught Teresa ends up in the hands of the police for drugs due to the vendetta of a woman who cannot resist her beauty; she might be able to save herself by selling her body.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Teresa must humiliate herself to escape being deported by Céspedes, although he decides to collect Sheila's debt with a vengeance.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Teresa seeks revenge with her own hands and shows Sheila just what The Mexican is made of, when Santiago is about to be set up by the mafia, who is looking for payback for his betrayal.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Teresa is on the run again over a crime that she didn't commit when she is blamed for Sheila's attempted murder, while Santiago evades the Pernas Clan's trap.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Teresa succumbs to desire for Santiago and tries to erase the memory of El Güero with his kisses, and realizes that, for her, history repeats itself when it comes to men.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Teresa returns to the trafficking nightmare with Santiago and decides to leave him for good because of it, when she confronts Dris for helping a friend.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Santiago gambles with his life and accepts a deal that hurts him financially, while Fátima faces the cruelty of her lies in search of a lost son.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Santiago risks his life for Teresa and ends up killing Josef to save her, while Fátima must take back her son and flee Morocco with him.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Teresa proposes turning Santiago into a drug trafficker, when Col. Abdelkader receives an unexpected visit from The Mexican.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Teresa starts narcotics career, since she must start dealing hashish in order to save her life, not knowing that her ambition will be her doom, along with Santiago.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Santiago is the victim of Dris's envy, who decides to rat him out to the Moroccan police, but it is Lalo who is tortured for information.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: A promise of love seduces The Mexican, who decides to leave her life behind and give herself to Santiago and the security of joining him in life and death.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: Teresa and Santiago start their first mission, and without knowing how, they evade the law with a shipment of cocaine while being watched from the air...
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Teresa is afraid of admitting love, even though Santiago shows her how he feels through his jealousy and a proposal, The Mexican almost loses her chance of starting over.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: Teresa loses again. She knows that love only brings death for the man that she wants at her side, and Santiago is now facing that fate because of his trafficking.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: Teresa earns respect in jail by defending herself in a fight for her life, while she finds an enemy in Makoki who could make her life very difficult.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: Teresa faces death in a fire started by Makoki, all for a debt of honor and a fight over a sought-after inmate.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: Teresa is haunted by crimes she didn't commit, and now is blamed for the fire and death of Adriana, all for a duel of loyalty and strength in the heat of sexual urges.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: Teresa is released from jail but gets mixed up with Patty when she tries to seduce her with ambition and the promise of putting an end to her bad luck.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: Teresa and Patty join forces to sell her stash and start the climb to the top; they must do business with the Russian mafia.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: Teresa makes a deal with the Russian mafia when her audacity helps protect Oleg and his drugs; she doesn't know that this is why she puts her own loyalty at stake.
episodes.title: Episode 25

episodes.synopsis: Teresa deals in hashish, Lalo's freedom and Fátima's peace of mind, all for a lucrative arrangement with the Russians and personal vendetta.
episodes.title: Episode 26

episodes.synopsis: Teresa's enemies meet their end, thanks to a dangerous alliance that's profiting from Santiago's death and The Mexican's past.
episodes.title: Episode 27

episodes.synopsis: Teresa tries to clear her name but her past continues to haunt her, and while some die at her orders, others rise from the ashes.
episodes.title: Episode 28

episodes.synopsis: Teresa is the victim of blackmail by new enemies who threaten to kill her people, while Dris tries to save his life by turning to Epifanio.
episodes.title: Episode 29

episodes.synopsis: Teresa sees Fátima die in her arms, an innocent victim of The Queen's enemies and past.
episodes.title: Episode 30

episodes.synopsis: After getting information out of Dris, Ratas kills him and hangs him on a bridge in Mexico.
episodes.title: Episode 31

episodes.synopsis: The death of Dris is a clue that casts suspicion on Epifanio Vargas, while Teresa plans on traveling with a cartel that will put her face-to-face with her enemies.
episodes.title: Episode 32

episodes.synopsis: Teresa makes enemies of El Gallego's enemies in the midst of a trafficking deal with drug lords, when the debts of the past put her on a fatal path.
episodes.title: Episode 33

episodes.synopsis: A fatal Mexican game ends up being Teresa's revenge when Oleg gets his hands on her enemies while she closes a drug deal.
episodes.title: Episode 34

episodes.synopsis: Teresa has the lives of her enemies in her hands, and although the pain from her past compels her to kill them, Oleg convinces her not to get her hands dirty.
episodes.title: Episode 35

episodes.synopsis: El Ratas is willing to kill Teresa, but his mistakes will be the death of him when she wants to kill him with her own hands.
episodes.title: Episode 36

episodes.synopsis: Pote saves Teresa's life in an explosion ordered by the Pernas Clan, who want to get rid of The Mexican.
episodes.title: Episode 37

episodes.synopsis: The Pernas Clan loses its war with Teresa when she finds out that they tried to eliminate her, while Teo tries to win her heart.
episodes.title: Episode 38

episodes.synopsis: Teresa gets carried away by desire and confesses that she's attracted to Teo, while someone close is stricken with jealousy.
episodes.title: Episode 39

episodes.synopsis: Teresa succumbs to her desires, without realizing that Teo has a double life that she might get mixed up in.
episodes.title: Episode 40

episodes.synopsis: Someone tries to take Teo away from Teresa with an attempt on his life, all for a seductive opportunity that appears to take on another life.
episodes.title: Episode 41

episodes.synopsis: The attempted hit on Teo arouses Teresa's suspicions, and she is willing to take justice into her own hands in order to find out who informed on her.
episodes.title: Episode 42

episodes.synopsis: An alliance of hate and ambition is revealed between Eddie and Eugenia by their efforts to kill Teo, but Teresa is onto them.
episodes.title: Episode 43

episodes.synopsis: Teresa decides to avenge Teo, and it is Eddie who must pay when Teresa confronts Eugenia on her lies and ambitions.
episodes.title: Episode 44

episodes.synopsis: Teresa decides to join her enemy due under the pressure of their attacks, but there are ulterior motives for the deal.
episodes.title: Episode 45

episodes.synopsis: Teresa reveals Eugenia's crimes, which leads Teo to file for divorce, while The Queen throws her own party.
episodes.title: Episode 46

episodes.synopsis: Eugenia challenges Teresa at her party and threatens Teo for leaving her, without imagining that The Mexican has proof of her schemes.
episodes.title: Episode 47

episodes.synopsis: Eugenia can't handle the pressure and takes her own life after Teo decides to leave her for good because of her personal vendetta, which almost leads to his death.
episodes.title: Episode 48

episodes.synopsis: Verónica doesn't fall for The Queen's trap, and while she looks for traitors, news of a suicide might lead to the mafia's defeat.
episodes.title: Episode 49

episodes.synopsis: While Teresa is carried away by her sexual desire for Teo and tries to make a fresh start, an infiltrator marks the beginning of the end for The Mexican.
episodes.title: Episode 50

episodes.synopsis: Teo betrays Teresa and becomes a rat for the DEA, while The Mexican plans a shipment for the Russians.
episodes.title: Episode 51

episodes.synopsis: Teresa is blinded by love, but her allies aren't, and Teo is beginning to feel their eyes upon him, without knowing that a new Aljarafe is on its way.
episodes.title: Episode 52

episodes.synopsis: Teo cheats on Teresa with his lover, when The Mexican goes after the DEA rat.
episodes.title: Episode 53

episodes.synopsis: Teo's betrayal is finally exposed to Nino when a fatal accident claims Lupe or Patty as its victim.
episodes.title: Episode 54

episodes.synopsis: Lupe loses her life to Patty's accident, when Teo finally eliminates the sole witness who could expose him to Teresa.
episodes.title: Episode 55

episodes.synopsis: Life is cruel yet again to Teresa when Patty kills herself to get out of the way, revealing that the DEA is hot on her heels.
episodes.title: Episode 56

episodes.synopsis: Teo's lies and betrayal become a double-edged sword, because even though he tries to hide his alliances, Teresa's words betray suspicion.
episodes.title: Episode 57

episodes.synopsis: Teresa receives two major blows: Teo's betrayal ends to a new love without her knowing it, and the past lies of the man who she believed to be her godfather are revealed.
episodes.title: Episode 58

episodes.synopsis: Teo's game is exposed, and now it's Teresa who plans her own trap, while he tries to escape from the web of his own lies and deceit.
episodes.title: Episode 59

episodes.synopsis: Teresa's revenge means the end for Teo, the father of her child; the police lose the last ace up their sleeves when they lose track of their key witness.
episodes.title: Episode 60

episodes.synopsis: Teresa escapes Spanish justice with the help of the Russian and Willy, when Epifanio decides to confront the only threat that could put an end to his political career.
episodes.title: Episode 61

episodes.synopsis: Teresa escapes the Spanish police while death stalks her in her own country; Epifanio must deal with the revenge of El Ratas at the last minute.
episodes.title: Episode 62

episodes.synopsis: Teresa fulfills her promise of revenge and sends Epifanio Vargas, the great traitor from her past, to jail, while she starts a new life without leaving a trace.
episodes.title: Episode 63

episodes.synopsis: "Queen of the South" Teresa is now living in hiding as María in Italy, but her new life is upended when her daughter Sofía is kidnapped by her enemies.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Teresa makes her way back to Mexico for the first time in years and Epifanio tells her what she can do in exchange for getting her daughter back.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Galician narco Siso Pernas threatens Pedro while looking for Teresa, who is simultaneously in danger from another enemy seeking revenge.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Teresa travels to Málaga, just as Cayetana contacts Spanish authorities. Sofía and her mom exchange video messages. The DEA punishes Manuela.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: The Galicians catch up to Teresa and put her in grave danger. Sofía pretends to be very ill so that she can sneakily make a call on a cellphone.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Teresa confronts Cayetana, who responds by unleashing a bull. Sofía is rattled by Lupo's punishment for her rebellious behavior.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Drug lord Zurdo hosts a lively party for Mariano's presidential campaign. Across the world, Teresa arrives in Russia in search of Oleg.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Teresa reunites with an old friend, but worries someone has been following her. The Galicians investigate how she managed to escape them.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Siso aggressively interrogates Conejo, hoping to discover Teresa's whereabouts. Oleg asks the Russian president for permission to leave the country.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Oleg and Teresa try to escape Russia. Sofia is tormented by what she's overheard about her mother. Alejandro offers Epifanio's estranged wife a deal.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Rocio and Paloma end up on the run after a troubling incident with Juan. Teresa and Oleg are forced to get creative while fleeing to the Ukraine.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Sofia gets to know Batman a little better and sends a hidden message to her mother. Oleg tells Teresa he distrusts her friend Francesco/Lupo.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Teresa and Oleg travel to Málaga. Sofia continues to plot against her kidnappers. Rocio's and Paloma's faces appear on the news.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Lupo and Teresa head to Rocio and Paloma's hostel to help them escape from the police. Oleg punishes a former employee for his betrayals.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Teresa voices her suspicions about Lupo while on their date. Paloma receives startling news. Juanito's family goes after Cayetana before his funeral.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Sofia's plan to escape Morgana goes awry. Teresa offers to help Cayetana in exchange for being left alone. Epifanio visits his estranged wife's priest.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: Rocio and Paloma attempt to make amends with their grandmother. Lupo chases a fleeing and frightened Sofia. Teresa sends Conejo a message.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Teresa reunites with old friends who try and help her free Conejo. Back in Mexico, Sofia makes a new friend and performs on the street for money.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: Teresa is heartbroken when she listens to her daughter's angry message. Sofia begins learning more about Simon's underground world.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: Teresa and Oleg desperately search for Sofia as Lupo and Alejandro do the same. Willy brings Ray to Mexico, where he meets Rocio and Paloma.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: While trying to escape Mercedes, Sofia runs into a familiar face. Veva makes a startling discovery about Epifanio. Jonathan keeps investigating Manuela.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: Simon tries to help Sofia break free from her latest kidnapper. Willy asks Ray to decrypt the files Jonathan found in Manuela's safe.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: Cayetana receives an unexpected but welcome phone call. Lupo and Teresa reunite and become closer than ever. Carmen approaches Marietta.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: Carmen's bombshell interview stirs up a media circus just as someone close to her is killed. Oleg argues with Teresa about her latest romance.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: Teresa visits her old house in Culiacán and is struck by her nostalgia, as well as the condition she finds the house in. Flores encounters trouble.
episodes.title: Episode 25

episodes.synopsis: Teresa finally meets with her target: Zurdo Villa. Epifanio offers Carmen a deal in order to help their granddaughter. Lupo brings Sofia to an island.
episodes.title: Episode 26

episodes.synopsis: Zurdo hosts a party in Teresa's honor and presents the Queen of the South with a very generous gift. Sofia asks Lupo about his feelings for her mother.
episodes.title: Episode 27

episodes.synopsis: Zurdo confronts Teresa about bringing a tracking device to his party. Meanwhile, Epifanio goes on-air to speak about his love life.
episodes.title: Episode 28

episodes.synopsis: Epifanio proposes to Veva despite her father's disapproval. Teresa and Lupo confess their feelings for each other and Sofia misunderstands.
episodes.title: Episode 29

episodes.synopsis: Teresa and her friends set a trap for Siso Pernas and his cousins while Oleg leads a team to steal drugs from one of Zurdo's trucks.
episodes.title: Episode 30

episodes.synopsis: Teresa's revenge plan continues as she tells Zurdo she suspects Siso stole his drugs. Sofia confronts Epifanio when he visits the island.
episodes.title: Episode 31

episodes.synopsis: Zurdo asks Teresa to partner with him and share her international expertise. Sofia gets into trouble while running from Lupo. Willy speaks with Carmen.
episodes.title: Episode 32

episodes.synopsis: Teresa negotiates the terms of her partnership with Zurdo. Alejandro meets Danilo's family. Lupo worries about Sofia.
episodes.title: Episode 33

episodes.synopsis: Sofia's message in a bottle is discovered as Lupo hunts for her in the woods. Willy attempts to warn Teresa about Manuela. Alejandro is blackmailed.
episodes.title: Episode 34

episodes.synopsis: Teresa is shaken and misses Sofia even more after meeting Zurdo's daughter. Cayetana is dubious upon receiving a peculiar phone call.
episodes.title: Episode 35

episodes.synopsis: Zurdo, Teresa and their respective entourages travel to Morocco. Alejandro asks Manuela to conduct another job for him. Cayetana questions Lupo.
episodes.title: Episode 36

episodes.synopsis: Abdelkader impresses Zurdo with his Moroccan party and they talk business with Teresa. Cayetana receives the judge's custodial decision about Sofia.
episodes.title: Episode 37

episodes.synopsis: Lupo introduces Teresa to his "family" and dinner gets complicated. Sofia tries a new tactic to attract attention. Renata sees a child psychologist.
episodes.title: Episode 38

episodes.synopsis: In Italy, Teresa, Zurdo and their colleagues attend an important business meeting with high-stakes players in the drug trade.
episodes.title: Episode 39

episodes.synopsis: Lupo attempts to extract Teresa from a fatal and explosive situation as enemies from her past life seek vengeance on the Queen of the South.
episodes.title: Episode 40

episodes.synopsis: Cayetana visits Mexico with the judge's court order. Sofia celebrates her birthday on the island. Alejandro checks in with the president of the U.S.
episodes.title: Episode 41

episodes.synopsis: Teresa meets presidential candidate Mariano and tours Zurdo's bunker. Epifanio and Veva get married. Oleg devises a plan to stop Cayetana.
episodes.title: Episode 42

episodes.synopsis: Sofia is saddened at the thought of saying goodbye to Lupo. On the verge of completing her mission, Teresa feels guilty about betraying Zurdo.
episodes.title: Episode 43

episodes.synopsis: Teresa gives Epifanio information and speaks with her team about what each of them plan to do going forward, once the mission has ended.
episodes.title: Episode 44

episodes.synopsis: Zurdo takes another look at the hostage note Renata has been talking about and wonders if Teresa is about to double-cross him.
episodes.title: Episode 45

episodes.synopsis: Zurdo confronts Teresa with his suspicions and her plan begins to fall apart. Alejandro gives Manuela and Lupo surprising orders.
episodes.title: Episode 46

episodes.synopsis: Manuela attempts to hunt down Sofia and ends up injuring someone unexpected. Meanwhile, Faustino finds himself in a troubling situation.
episodes.title: Episode 47

episodes.synopsis: Sofia does everything she can to try to save Lupo. A devastated Teresa hits the streets with her friends to look for her daughter.
episodes.title: Episode 48

episodes.synopsis: Teresa comes face to face with Sofia's kidnapper and is shocked and devastated by what she discovers. Jonathan tries to track down Manuela.
episodes.title: Episode 49

episodes.synopsis: Lupo urges Teresa to believe him as she tries to devise a quick plan for her and Sofia to escape from Mexico with Jonathan's help.
episodes.title: Episode 50

episodes.synopsis: Conejo, Paloma and the others mourn while Teresa reflects back on the explosive events that transpired. Batman keeps a special someone alive.
episodes.title: Episode 51

episodes.synopsis: Teresa tells Lupo she will trust him again if he leads her to Manuela. Meanwhile, Zurdo's hitmen attack the Queen of the South's workplace and home.
episodes.title: Episode 52

episodes.synopsis: Sheldon informs Alejandro about the new plan the U.S. government has for the Mexican presidency. Teresa travels to Washington, D.C. to save a friend.
episodes.title: Episode 53

episodes.synopsis: Teresa finds out about the DEA's shocking new plan. Lencho attempts to break Zurdo out of the hospital. Cayetana bonds with her granddaughter.
episodes.title: Episode 54

episodes.synopsis: Lupo and Teresa warn Epifanio about the target on his back. Looking for information, Ray gets to know Danilo. Alejandro meets his campaign manager.
episodes.title: Episode 55

episodes.synopsis: Zurdo swears vengeance on Teresa. Batman surprises Teresa by reuniting her with a friend. Epifanio grows suspicious of his brother-in-law.
episodes.title: Episode 56

episodes.synopsis: A shooting at a presidential rally and the ensuing aftermath rattles Alejandro. Batman goes on the run. Teresa and Zurdo face off.
episodes.title: Episode 57

episodes.synopsis: Juanito's mother attacks Sofia and tragedy occurs. Batman begs Teresa to help him hide from the police. Alejandro is threatened.
episodes.title: Episode 58

episodes.synopsis: Alejandro takes Teresa's bait and Danilo learns more about the man he's been dating. Cayetana confesses to a crime. Rocio reunites with Faustino.
episodes.title: Episode 59

episodes.synopsis: Teresa and her friends have their final confrontation with Alejandro and the DEA as all of their collective lies are exposed.
episodes.title: Episode 60
